body:
But I think that the main problem for your simulation is this:
the WindowMaterial:SimpleGlazingSystem.
Is the method that you used for U-value (with frames) suitable for this type of model?
Look at the link below.
[](But%20I%20think%20that%20the%20main%20problem%20for%20your%20simulation%20is%20this:%20the%20WindowMaterial:SimpleGlazingSystem.%20Is%20the%20method%20that%20you%20used%20for%20U-value%20(with%20frames)%20suitable%20for%20this%20type%20of%20model?%20Look%20at%20the%20link%20below.%20http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/engineering-reference/page-043.html)[http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/engineering-reference/pag...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/engineering-reference/page-043.html) And "WindowProperty:FrameAndDivider" is not defined. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/S-*Q0dYAAj0pexLOa9plTfsX2VZKDM4wZZma8YpLBu8T1fTtCKOu4K77LVqUniLG9jkf4mvco0jtqBDgd31CT721IpI7gu6r/frame.png)
